# effectValue(size:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the current value of the effect.

## Declaration

```swift
func effectValue(size: CGSize) -> ProjectionTransform
```

## Applying effects

- **ignoredByLayout()**: Returns an effect that produces the same geometry transform as this effect, but only applies the transform while rendering its view.

items.description: Returns an effect that produces the same geometry transform as this effect, but only applies the transform while rendering its view.
items.name: ignoredByLayout()
